content.raw:
I got a couple of deprecation warnings due to SDF5. I just noticed that the fix might be non trivial because it involves deprecating some command line tool functionality (`gz sdf --version <number>`). So I'm ok with leaving the warnings for now (like we still have for ign-math3) and fixing these in gazebo8.1.

~~~
/home/louise/code/gazeboB/tools/gz.cc:973:32: warning: ‘static void sdf::SDF::Version(const string&)’ is deprecated [-Wdeprecated-declarations]
/home/louise/code/gazeboB/tools/gz.cc:993:49: warning: ‘static void sdf::SDF::Version(const string&)’ is deprecated [-Wdeprecated-declarations]
~~~
content.html:
I got a couple of deprecation warnings due to SDF5. I just noticed that the fix might be non trivial because it involves deprecating some command line tool functionality (gz sdf --version <number>). So I'm ok with leaving the warnings for now (like we still have for ign-math3) and fixing these in gazebo8.1.
